title: MoroTek Foot Rest, Portable Travel Footrest Flight Carry-on Foot Rest Office Adjustable Feet Rest Foot Hammock(Black)
feature: [Lightweight&Easy to Carry] Best assistant for traveling & business trip. lightweight and mini carry-on flight foot rests, easy to carry without increase your bag's burden.

[Easy to Use] Easy to install the foot hammock, .Hook the string part of the footrest to the table, snap the buckle, lengthening your feet, float your legs, swing your legs to relieve fatigue, enjoy it.(PU leather inward, and oxford fabric outward)

[Extensive Use] Foot rest hammock can be applied to most of occasions like office, bus, airplane, long distance subway, train, school and home etc. reduce pressure on your back and relieve feet fatigue.
[Adjustable Height Straps]-The adjustable straps allows for the perfect length to provide the necessary support. When flight a long time in an airplane. This footrest can erase your fatigue easily.
[Quality Warranty]-If there any problems with this item please feel free to contact our customer service team.We will try our best to help you solve the problem.
description: MoroTek Travel Footrest enables you to create your own flying environment, giving you the ability to raise your feet to any height during your journey. it also brings unbeatable comfort to those who struggle to reach existing airplane footrests, and also improves circulation and reduces DVT risk. Weight: 50g, folded size 8*2*1.5 inch, flat size:15.74*8.27 inch,21*40CM Color:Black Weight: 50g Dimension: 8*5*1.5inch The length of string: 14.96 - 27.16inch (adjustable) Material:PU leather inward, and oxford fabric outward Hook the belt to the table. Snap the buckle. Adjust the strap length to your need. Lengthening your feet, float your legs, swing your legs to relieve fatigue. Enjoy the relax during using it.
